item.title: About Me
item.description:
You want to know a little more about me?

My name is Bailey Ling, a.k.a bling, and I’ve been building software for over a decade now. I grew up in Canada and I’m currently working and residing in New York City.

One of my most successful creations is vim-airline, a statusline plugin for Vim which is now being maintained by the community. I’ve also created some other useful things for Vim and Emacs.
